directions: Combine everything in a bowl. Add just enough olive oil to coat and season with salt and pepper, lots of pepper, to taste.
If you are making this ahead combine everything except the mint as fresh mint tends to wilt and turn black once cut. Stir in the mint just before serving.
ingredients: 1 15 oz can or 1 1/2 cups white beans, drained and rinsed
zest and juice from half a lemon
title: WHITE BEAN SALAD WITH PEAS AND MINT
